body.p: Default templates are available for JATS documents. They are stored in /frameworks/jats/templates folder and they can be used for easily creating basic JATS documents.
The default JATS templates that are available when creating new documents from templatesnew documents from templates are as follows:

ul.li: Archiving - JATS archiving tag set version 1.1.
Authoring - JATS authoring tag set version 1.1.
Book - JATS book tag set version 1.1.
Publishing - JATS publishing tag set version 1.1.
